title: The tuition and miscellaneous fees payment form for the first semester of 2024 academic year can be downloaded from August 19!
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處出納組 - 鄧瑞美 - deng@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906366
對象： 全校學生
標題： The tuition and miscellaneous fees payment form for the first semester of 2024 academic year can be downloaded from August 19!
日期： Mon, 19 Aug 2024 17:38:45 +0800

Dear students
The tuition and miscellaneous fee payment form for the first semester of 2024 academic year can be downloaded now! The tuition and miscellaneous fees should be paid between August 19, 2024 and September 9, 2024.

Please visit the portal for tuitions and miscellaneous fees of the Bank of Taiwan to download and print out the payment form (link:https://school.bot.com.tw/ )

The payment slip for tuition and miscellaneous fees for the first semester of the 113th academic year can be downloaded under category 111332. For related procedures, please refer to the tuition and miscellaneous fees payment slip printing process at the following link: https://ga.ndhu.edu.tw/var/file/6/1006/img/4408/408320426.pdf”

If you have questions regarding course selection, please contact Ms. Ta in Curriculum Division of Academic Affairs Office at 03-8906123.

If you have questions regarding Student Dormitory Application, please contact Ms. Chen in Student Living Services Division Office of Student Affairs Office at 03-8906212.

If you have question regarding payment, please contact Ms. Deng in Cashier Disivion of General Affairs Office at 03-8906366.

Best regards,
The Cashier Section of the Office of General Affairs
August 19, 2024
